short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-on is for developers working with Oracle® CPQ Cloud. Used to copy transaction ID  and XML document of a quote

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Add-on is for developers working with Oracle® CPQ Cloud. Add-on is used to copy transaction ID of a quote and also provides the XML document of the quote.

Click the browser action after opening a transaction, on the popup click on copy symbol to copy transaction ID. Click XML Document Symbol to bring up Transaction XML

This add-on is NOT created or supported by Oracle Corporation. It was created purely for developer ease and efficiency.
